messages.message: Audit logs for human in the loop doesn't seem to be in the documentation. Also, enterprise customers are going to want to retrieve these logs via the API. We should schedule development of the API for audit logs on the roadmap.

did you mean to create 3 tickets? i assume not?

we are already adding Human Review audit logs as part of https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4006 in Q2

i closed the later two and kept EPD-4479

cc @Josh Rad for whether you want to keep that or just use EPD-4006 instead
Slack said there was an error creating the ticket so I tried a few times and Iâ€™m unable to delete the extras. Thanks for the feedback and cleanup on the tickets.

@Serena what @norman.leitman is referring to is making the changelogs to Human Reviews here API-accessible (right side of the screenshot).

with the audit logs we're introducing in EPD-4006, we're adding any updates/changes to reviews to the Audit Logs which means they will be API - accessible. but its interesting that its already sort of captured here cc @Serena
ohhhh i see - that modification history is already accessible via API! https://docs.instabase.com/api-sdk/api-reference/runs/get-run-results#response.body.files.documents.fields.edit_history
